TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit OdbcPermissionAttribute extends System.Data.Common.DBDataPermissionAttribute
Public NotInheritable Class OdbcPermissionAttribute Inherits DBDataPermissionAttribute

Attribute.AttributeName: System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Assembly | System.AttributeTargets.Class | System.AttributeTargets.Constructor | System.AttributeTargets.Method | System.AttributeTargets.Struct, AllowMultiple=true, Inherited=false)

summary.span: 使安全性動作與自訂安全性屬性產生關聯。

span.span: Associates a security action with a custom security attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別僅供未來使用，當部分信任案例啟用.NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC。This class is intended for future use when the .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC is enabled for partial trust scenarios. .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC 目前需要 FullTrust 權限。The .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC currently requires FullTrust permission. 目前，使用`OdbcPermissionAttribute`類別沒有任何作用。Currently, using the `OdbcPermissionAttribute` class has no effect. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Code Access Security and ADO.NET](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/code-access-security.md)。For more information, see [Code Access Security and ADO.NET](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/code-access-security.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction action) cil managed

param.name: action
param.span: 其中一個 值表示動作可以使用宣告式安全性來執行。

span.span: One of the values representing an action that can be performed by using declarative security.

summary.span: 使用其中一個 值，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with one of the values.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission CreatePermission() cil managed
Public Overrides Function CreatePermission () As IPermission

summary.span: 傳回 物件，這個物件是根據屬性 (Attribute) 的屬性 (Property) 所設定。

span.span: Returns an object that is configured according to the attribute properties.
